abstract: Ahead of Tuesday’s primary in Wisconsin, Senator Ted Cruz of Texas is targeting Gov. John Kasich with a TV attack ad for the first time, suggesting that Mr. Kasich engaged in cronyism as Ohio’s governor.

headline.main: In TV Ad, Ted Cruz Accuses John Kasich of Cronyism

snippet: Ahead of Tuesday’s primary in Wisconsin, Senator Ted Cruz of Texas is targeting Gov. John Kasich with a TV attack ad for the first time, suggesting that Mr. Kasich engaged in cronyism as Ohio’s governor.
